question: Determine the length of Line_B_B in the figure.
qt_description: Line Line_B_B (Description: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L3 (foot B on extension))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a complete circle (center O1, init point circle_1) with radius 5. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: circle (center O1) scaled by 2 (new radius 10). Round 2: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed 3-sided polygon (center O1) around circle. Found 8 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 6 new lines and 7 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 9, total arcs: 9, total points: 8.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L3 (foot B on extension)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a circle centered at O1 with radius 5 is first scaled concentrically by a factor of 2 to form a larger circle of radius 10. A triangle ABC is then circumscribed about the smaller circle, with vertices A, B, and C lying on the larger circle. Points D, E, and F are the points of tangency between the smaller circle and the sides of triangle ABC. Line L3 is defined as line AC. From point B, a perpendicular is dropped to line L3, with the foot of the perpendicular labeled as point B' (not shown explicitly in the image but implied by the operation description).

Determine the length of the perpendicular segment from point B to line L3 — that is, the length of segment BB'.
